title: Launching Impactful Software Engineering

description: Without measurement, everything is done by intuition. And yet, the maturity of your engineering team lies in its ability to make data-driven decisions.

title: It's not just a matter of technique
description: Technique alone is not enough to create impact. Your role is to make sure your company is working on the right things.

description: That’s it, you have an offer from a startup on the table, but you don’t really know what to think about it. Let’s talk about it.
